title: Younger Generations Rethinking Work
itunes:title: Younger Generations Rethinking Work
description:
Dr. Anthony Harris, Chief Innovation Officer at WorkCare, discusses vaccine efficacy for the omicron variant. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Cristina Lindblad talk about the Businessweek Magazine story From the Great Resignation to Lying Flat, Workers Are Opting Out. Carlyle Group Co-Founder David Rubenstein discusses his book "The American Experiment: Dialogues on a Dream." And we Drive to the Close with Lisa Erickson, Co-Head of Public Markets Group at U.S. Bank.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
